section.title: libguac
section.para: The C API for exdending and developing with Guacamole is libguac. All native components produced by the Guacamole project link with this library, and this library provides the common basis for extending the native functionality of those native components (by implementing client plugins).

libguac is used mainly for developing client plugins like libguac-client-vnc or libguac-client-rdp, or for developing a proxy supporting the Guacamole protocol like guacd. This chapted is intended to give an overview of how libguac is used, and how to use it for general communication with the Guacamole protocol.
